item.title: A note on`application` in mix.exs starting from Elixir 1.4
item.description: Starting from Elixir 1.4, we don’t need to specify our application lists in application. It is automatically inferred from our dependencies. (Check the release notes here) Do note that it only automatically infer the application lists if the :applications key is empty. If you had already declared your it in your mix.
